oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Fortid og fremtid for EU's landbrugspolitik
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kledal, Paul Rye
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Historical view as well as the political/economic reasons for the changes of the CAP presenting posibilities for a more progressive policy in the future frame of CAP.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: SALT c/o Mediefabrikken, ST. KOngensgade 40 C, postbox 188, 1006 KBH K
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kledal, Paul Rye (2004) Fortid og fremtid for EU's landbrugspolitik. [Past and present for the European Common Agriculture policy.] SALT, August 2004, 13 (4), pp. 17-18.
